mapper.insert: insert into lexiang_product (title, intro, createdate, modifydate, address, days, price, status) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{days,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update lexiang_product set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createdate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifydate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, days = #{days,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, title, intro, createdate, modifydate, address, days, price, status from lexiang_product
